logic

Class Enemy

  • java.lang.Object
    • logic.Actor
      • logic.Movable
        • logic.Entity
          • logic.Enemy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Collidable, Updatable

    public class Enemy
extends Entity
    An enemies goal is to kill the player. The enemy follows the player and deals damage to it by colliding.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • target

        private final Player target

    • Constructor Detail

      • Enemy

        public Enemy(java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double position,
             GameMap gameMap)
        Setting up the enemy's target with the game map's player and the position. Adds itself to the game map's actors and sets its image as well.
        Parameters:
        position - the enemy's position.
        gameMap - the game map the enemy is on.
